CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Research relative to Aether University?
SRP.A: Echo Research is {above} Aether University in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aether University relative to Echo Research?
SRP.A: Aether University is {below} Echo Research in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Research relative to Luminara Academy?
SRP.A: Echo Research is {above} Luminara Academy in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total research grants awarded?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Nova Institute}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total research grants awarded?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Luminara Academy}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aether University's minimum Research Grants Awarded in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aether University's minimum Research Grants Awarded is in {1973}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starburst College's maximum Research Grants Awarded in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starburst College's maximum Research Grants Awarded is in {1977}.

NC.Q: Between 1972 and 1973, was the average total Research Grants Awarded higher or lower than between 1977 and 1993?
NC.A: The average total research grants awarded between 1972 and 1973 was {lower} than between 1977 and 1993.

NC.Q: Between 1976 and 1996, did the total Research Grants Awarded experience a larger or smaller change than between 1969 and 1970?
NC.A: The change in total research grants awarded between 1976 and 1996 was {larger} than between 1969 and 1970.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1995, did the total Research Grants Awarded experience a larger or smaller change than between 1974 and 1994?
NC.A: The change in total research grants awarded between 1984 and 1995 was {smaller} than between 1974 and 1994.

NC.Q: Between 1980 and 1992, did the total Research Grants Awarded experience a larger or smaller change than between 1991 and 1993?
NC.A: The change in total research grants awarded between 1980 and 1992 was {larger} than between 1991 and 1993.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Nova Institute} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Luminara Academy and Echo Research first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Luminara Academy and Echo Research first exchanged leading positions in {1968}.
